title: Deepak Chopra: The Enlightenment Series
description: Deepak Chopra’s New York Times bestselling Buddha , Jesus , and Muhammad are now available together for the first time in this collectible paperback box set. Chopra’s inspiring and revelatory Enlightenment Series is more captivating than ever in this handsome matched gift set, ideal for fans of Chopra’s bestselling works, such as The Seven Spiritual Laws of Superheroes , and perfect for readers of other spiritual leaders and scholars, such as the Dalai Lama, Thich Nhat Hanh, Noah Levine, or C. S. Lewis.
author: Deepak Chopra
